tasks.check: deno task format:check && deno task lint:check && deno task type:check
tasks.test: deno task db:restart && deno test --allow-env --allow-net=127.0.0.1:3306 ./test.ts; deno task db:stop
tasks.db:restart: deno task db:stop && deno task db:start
tasks.typedoc: deno run -A npm:typedoc --theme minimal --ignoreCompilerErrors --excludePrivate --excludeExternals --entryPoint client.ts --mode file ./src --out ./docs
